thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-American Express Reports Credit Card Stats for Jan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-American Express Reports Credit Card Stats for Jan
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - American Express Co:
* AMERICAN EXPRESS-USCS CARD MEMBER LOANS 30 DAYS PAST DUE LOANS AS A % OF TOTAL 1.4 PERCENT AT JAN END VERSUS 1.3 PERCENT AT DEC END
* AMERICAN EXPRESS-U.S. SMALL BUSINESS CARD MEMBER LOANS 30 DAYS PAST DUE LOANS AS A % OF TOTAL 1.3 PERCENT AT JAN END VERSUS 1.2 PERCENT AT DEC END
* AMERICAN EXPRESS-USCS CARD MEMBER LOANS NET WRITE-OFF RATE â€“ PRINCIPAL ONLY 1.7 PERCENT AT JAN END VERSUS 2.0 PERCENT AT DEC END
* AMERICAN EXPRESS-U.S.SMALL BUSINESS CARD MEMBER LOANS NET WRITE-OFF RATE-PRINCIPAL ONLY 1.4 PERCENT AT JAN END VERSUS 1.6 PERCENT AT DEC END Source text: [ bit.ly/2o2lwXJ ] Further company coverage:
